resources.string: Rhythm is an open source music player, based on the design of the very talented Alexandr Demidov. Developed by Laith Nurie
You can contribute or report any bugs on Github
Realm Java is published under the Apache 2.0 license. The underlying core is available under the Realm Core Binary License while we work to open-source it under the Apache 2.0 license.
